search_query: AppLovin competitors 2015 mobile gaming ad tech
context: In 2015, AppLovin was an emerging mobile advertising and app monetization platform, having only recently come out of stealth mode in 2014. Founded in 2012 and initially funded with $4 million from angel investors and Streamlined Ventures, the company was building its presence in the rapidly growing mobile gaming advertising market. During this period, AppLovin competed primarily with established mobile ad networks and monetization platforms that were helping developers market and monetize their apps across iOS and Android platforms.
